MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk, affecting properties in Viewfield Park and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.33pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the nature of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.30pm on the 14th of March 2021.
